title: Trust Wallet counters investigation rumors and vulnerability concerns
description:
Trust Wallet has denied reports that it is under investigation by the US government or its agencies, according to a Feb. 15 statement. ‘Binance Trust Wallet’ vulnerability Earlier today, multiple reports indicated that the National Institute of Standards and Technology (NIST), a US agency responsible for setting technology and cybersecurity standards, is investigating a potential […]

The post Trust Wallet counters investigation rumors and vulnerability concerns appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Crypto investment products draw over $1 billion in investments as momentum builds
description: Crypto investment products have garnered over $1 billion in inflows, raising the total for the year to $2.7 billion, as reported by asset management firm CoinShares.

title: SEC Chair Gensler Critiques Bitcoin as ‘Token of Choice’ for Ransomware, Despite Spot ETF Approvals
description: In a revealing conversation with David Westin on Bloomberg TV’s “Wall Street Week,” Gary Gensler, Chair of the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC), talked about the intricate challenges of regulating Bitcoin and the broader cryptocurrency market. The Nuanced Approach to Bitcoin ETFs Gensler recounted the SEC’s journey with Bitcoin-related products, particularly highlighting the approval […]

title: Rockwallet Steps in to Adopt Wyre’s Customers Following Shutdown
description: According to the crypto payments company Wyre, based in San Francisco, which ceased operations in June 2023, the multi-currency self-custodial wallet platform Rockwallet has taken over Wyre’s entire customer base. On Thursday, Rockwallet announced it has been reaching out to customers to ensure a smooth transition in their digital asset endeavors, eliminating the need for […]

title: Kelexo (KLXO) presale draws Tron & DOGE holders, eyes 25x growth
description: In the dynamic world of cryptocurrency, where innovation and potential for high returns abound, the presale of Kelexo (KLXO) has emerged as a focal point of attention for investors, particularly those holding Tron (TRX) and Dogecoin (DOGE). With the possibility…

title: Chainalysis: Crypto money laundering falls 29% as Lazarus, others respond to mixer sanctions
description: Chainalysis reported a 29% decline in crypto money laundering activity in 2023 as U.S. authorities and other world governments sanctioned mixing services.
